title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description:
When performing a search (Build 200201151) for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not being selected. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Search for references to the field.
OB:
1. Double-click on the search result.

Observed Result: The first match is not selected.
EB: There is no expected behavior mentioned in the bug report.
SR:
To resolve this issue, please ensure the following:

1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE.
2. Ensure that you have the source file (rt.jar) available.
3. Open the java.io.File class.
4. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
